<h1>car2go API Documentation</h1>
<p>The car2go API offers access to up-to-date car2go information
such as vehicles available, parking spots and gas stations. <br/>Furthermore
we offer access to protected functions for registered developers. This
way you can write applications that manages bookings for a user.</p>
